mapper.select: select a.id id,a.resource_content resource_content,a.resource_type_id resource_type_id,b.type_name type_name from tbl_resource a left join tbl_resource_type b on a.resource_type_id=b.id where a.id=#{id}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (@rowNO := @rowNo+1) AS rowno,a.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM tbl_resource WHERE resource_status = 1 AND resource_content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{resource_content},'%') union SELECT * FROM tbl_resource WHERE resource_status = 1 AND resource_keyword LIKE CONCAT('%',#{resource_content},'%') union SELECT * FROM tbl_resource WHERE resource_status = 1 AND resource_author LIKE CONCAT('%',#{resource_content},'%') ) a ,(SELECT @rowNO :=0) b LIMIT 30 ) cc ORDER BY rowno

SELECT a.id,a.resource_content,a.resource_summary,a.img_index,a.img_index_size,a.img_list,a.img_list_size,a.img_main,a.img_main_size,a.resource_author FROM tbl_resource a where a.resource_type_id = 5 and a.resource_status = 1 order by a.create_date desc

SELECT a.id,a.resource_content,a.resource_summary,a.img_index,a.img_index_size,a.img_list,a.img_list_size,a.img_main,a.img_main_size,a.resource_author FROM (SELECT re.id,re.resource_content,re.resource_summary,re.img_index,re.img_index_size,re.img_list,re.img_list_size,re.img_main,re.img_main_size,re.resource_author FROM tbl_weekday_resource wr LEFT JOIN tbl_resource re ON wr.resource_id = re.id WHERE resource_status = 1 and wr.weekday_id = (SELECT w.id FROM tbl_weekday w WHERE w.start_date<= #{nowtime} AND w.end_date >=#{nowtime}) AND re.resource_type_id =#{resource_type_id}) a INNER JOIN (SELECT resource_id,property_id FROM tbl_resource_info WHERE property_id IN (SELECT property_id FROM tbl_baby_info WHERE baby_id = #{baby_id} GROUP BY property_id )) b1 ON a.id=b1.resource_id INNER JOIN (SELECT resource_id,level_id FROM tbl_resource_info WHERE level_id=(SELECT level_id FROM tbl_baby_info WHERE baby_id = #{baby_id} GROUP BY level_id ) ) b2 ON a.id=b2.resource_id GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY a.id
